entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,966Chapters: 5/75Kudos: 14

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: fragmentary blue
entry.summary:
Author: idyllic_dae

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,671Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 17

Summary: "He's harmless. Look at him," Derek says, and Stiles bristles."I am not—""You smell what I do," Talia speaks over him. "Do not be so easily fooled."Stiles isn't sure whose side to take. If he agrees with Talia, he argues against being set free. If he agrees with Derek, he admits he's weak and helpless. Neither option is appealing."Yes," Derek says. "But he's a kid, and he's terrified—""Actually, I'm seventeen and very brave—""—and he has no idea what he is."

entry.title: When the World Falls Apart
entry.summary:
Author: Silesaia_9

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,793Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 9

Summary: The world around them is slowly breaking apart. Old certainties crumble, and the line between safety and danger grows ever thinner.Amidst it all, two people find themselves navigating uncharted waters, where survival depends not just on strength, but on trust.A story that centers on loss and the search for loved ones, focusing on feelings and the slow, steady building of a solid bond, step by step.

entry.title: A Crown in His Hands
entry.summary:
Author: simplyn2deep

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,055Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Beaconia has entered a new age. With Derek Hale named Regent and Stiles Stilinski no longer just a shadow from the past, the palace begins to shift. But new titles bring new expectations—and not everyone wants to see the wolf and the rose in bloom. As the monarchy evolves, Derek and Stiles must navigate rising public scrutiny, old scars, and the quiet hope of building a life not just for the kingdom, but for each other.

entry.title: From Sterek, With Sass
entry.summary:
Author: simplyn2deep

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,679Chapters: 76/?Kudos: 6

Summary: From Sterek, With Sass is a collection of Sterek drabbles that captures the essence of Derek Hale and Stiles Stilinski in all their glory, with a healthy dose of snark, sass, and wit. Whether it's Stiles' dry humor, Derek's sharp one-liners, or the rest of the pack’s sarcastic camaraderie, these drabbles bring the characters to life in brief yet memorable moments.From dealing with supernatural threats to navigating awkward personal situations, this collection serves up laughs, love, and plenty of biting remarks. It's Sterek, but with the sass turned up to eleven.

entry.title: How To Colossally Fuck Shit Up
entry.summary:
Author: Cashewchococake

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,455Chapters: 24/?Kudos: 181

Summary: A story about Derek and Stiles building their family and trying to find their way to each other.orStiles was looking at him expectedly.Derek took a deep breath and prepared himself for the upcoming words. “But I wasn’t the only one he smelled like, Stiles.”He looked pleadingly at Stiles, who'd gone deathly pale, and was now shaking his head.“Stiles-, Eli is your son.” Derek forced out.Stiles let out a small breathless sound of “Oh!”He shot up from the couch and took his head between his hands, pulling his hair.When that didn’t help to quiet the raging flood of questions in his head, he started pacing.“What? -I mean…how? How is that even possible?""Why the hell would you keep that from me?” He was spluttering.Stiles couldn’t believe what he was hearing.  Why would Derek do that?

entry.title: Momma Stiles to the Fucking Rescue you Bunch of FailWolfs
entry.summary:
Author: Estra4

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,084Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 261

Summary: Stiles needed a break from Scott and his Allison hat (get it because he has his head so far up her ass... you know what, never mind, I know I’m funny).After the absolute shit show that was the warehouses everything, Stiles was ready to sleep. Unfortunately, that sleep was being impeded by the infestation that was the Hale Pack. From would be runaways sneaking into his house at all hours to trauma bond, to a not so dead Creeperwolf, an angst ridden previous lizard person, and newly borne banshee in the body of pre-existing queen bee, not to mention the newly christened curly haired pup and the raging eyebrowed Alpha; it was a wonder Stiles would ever get a break for the rest of summer.Though an Alpha pack turning up at the same time as wolf twins was purely a coincident – Stiles is sure, and the less said about human sacrifices the safer for his sanity.Stiles is starting to think he jinked himself when he said nothing ever happened in this town. Too fucking much was happening and Stiles would like a refund, thank you, because clearly his stereotypical small town was broken.

entry.title: Stiles' Treasures
entry.summary:
Author: Ann_shawol24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,783Chapters: 12/26Kudos: 74

Summary: Allison is about to have her child, but her birth brings more complications than expected.   • Stiles is a father
  • Scott is a father
  • All grown up and with children

entry.title: call it off
entry.summary:
Author: endversed

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 98,203Chapters: 9/11Kudos: 856

Summary: “You kissed me,” Stiles says. To that, Derek says nothing. His gaze does not leave Stiles’ mouth. “But you… you’re straight,” Stiles carries on. And still, Derek says nothing. His fingers twitch harshly around his grip on thin air. “You have a girlfriend,” Stiles whispers. Derek is on his feet in an instant.  Stiles is the gay, terminally-single loser of Beacon Hills High. Derek is the straight, cheerleader-dating jock he should have been smart enough to stay away from.
